titles.educWork: Education and work experience (not as a developer)

educWork.courses: Completed project management courses at the National Academy of Public Administration under the President of Ukraine in 2007
educWork.responsibilities: Construction of roofs and facades - promotion of services; negotiations, communication with customers; preparation of proposals, documentation (estimates); project management: team, calculations (costs), constant quality control; provision of materials, equipment, tools; recruitment and training of personnel; construction works

technicalSkills: Knowledge of roofing and facade technologies, materials
Preparation of proposals, estimates, and reports
Implementation of technical solutions to improve work quality
Practical personal experience in performing all types of construction work
managementSkills: Negotiations, solving financial and technical issues with the client
Coordination with designers, subcontractors, material suppliers
Planning, task distribution, managing workflow and staff

skills.title: Creative thinking and idea generation
skills.description: Ability to find unconventional solutions and generate new ideas.

skills.title: Insightfulness and intuition
skills.description: Ability to foresee developments and analyze hidden opportunities in situations.

skills.title: Emotional intelligence and diplomacy
skills.description: Skills in managing emotions, building trusting relationships, and effectively interacting with colleagues.

skills.title: Stress resistance and adaptability
skills.description: Ability to remain calm in stressful situations and adapt quickly to changes.

skills.title: Communication and tact
skills.description: Ability to communicate effectively, find common ground, and work as part of a team.

skills.title: Result-oriented focus
skills.description: Capability to concentrate on achieving set goals and delivering results.

skills.title: Strategic thinking and planning
skills.description: Skills in planning long-term goals and developing strategies to achieve them.

skills.title: Team management and leadership
skills.description: Ability to lead, motivate a team, and effectively delegate tasks.

skills.title: Quick response and problem-solving
skills.description: Ability to quickly react to arising opportunities and solve emerging problems.

skills.title: Politeness and unobtrusiveness
skills.description: Ability to unobtrusively manage emotions and behavior, finding an approach to any individual.

goals: My goal is to save your time and make the choice easier, allowing you to quickly assess my competencies and determine if I am suitable for you.
I have completed these courses, gained knowledge and initial experience, which I want to convey to you in order to get a job.
